title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

actors.name: Tim Robbins
actors.biography: Tim Robbins is an American actor, director, and producer. He has won numerous awards, including an Academy Award for his role in 'Mystic River'.

actors.name: Morgan Freeman
actors.biography: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, producer, and narrator. He has won various awards throughout his career, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in 'Million Dollar Baby'.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

actors.name: Marlon Brando
actors.biography: Marlon Brando was an American actor and film director. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest actors of all time.

actors.name: Al Pacino
actors.biography: Al Pacino is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his roles in iconic films such as 'The Godfather' trilogy, 'Scarface', and 'Heat'.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as The Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

actors.name: Christian Bale
actors.biography: Christian Bale is a British actor known for his intense method acting and physical transformations for roles. He is best known for his portrayal of Batman in 'The Dark Knight' trilogy.

actors.name: Heath Ledger
actors.biography: Heath Ledger was an Australian actor and music video director. He gained worldwide acclaim for his portrayal of the Joker in 'The Dark Knight', earning him a posthumous Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

actors.name: Tom Hanks
actors.biography: Tom Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his roles in films such as 'Forrest Gump', 'Philadelphia', and 'Cast Away', and has won numerous awards, including two Academy Awards for Best Actor.

actors.name: Robin Wright
actors.biography: Robin Wright is an American actress and director. She gained prominence for her role as Jenny Curran in 'Forrest Gump' and has since appeared in numerous films and television series.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

actors.name: John Travolta
actors.biography: John Travolta is an American actor and singer. He rose to fame in the 1970s with his role as Vinnie Barbarino in the television series 'Welcome Back, Kotter', and later starred in films such as 'Saturday Night Fever' and 'Grease'.

actors.name: Uma Thurman
actors.biography: Uma Thurman is an American actress and model. She gained acclaim for her roles in films such as 'Pulp Fiction', 'Kill Bill', and 'Gattaca'.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

actors.name: Keanu Reeves
actors.biography: Keanu Reeves is a Canadian actor known for his roles in action films such as 'The Matrix' trilogy, 'Speed', and 'John Wick'.

actors.name: Laurence Fishburne
actors.biography: Laurence Fishburne is an American actor, playwright, producer, and director. He is best known for his roles in films such as 'The Matrix' trilogy, 'Boyz n the Hood', and 'What's Love Got to Do with It'.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

actors.name: Liam Neeson
actors.biography: Liam Neeson is an Irish actor known for his powerful performances in films such as 'Schindler's List', 'Taken', and 'Michael Collins'.

actors.name: Ben Kingsley
actors.biography: Ben Kingsley is a British actor with a career spanning over five decades. He has won numerous awards, including an Academy Award for his role in 'Gandhi'.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

actors.name: Brad Pitt
actors.biography: Brad Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He has received multiple awards, including an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award, and has been cited as one of the most influential and powerful people in the American entertainment industry.

actors.name: Edward Norton
actors.biography: Edward Norton is an American actor and filmmaker. He has been nominated for three Academy Awards for his performances in 'Primal Fear', 'American History X', and 'Birdman'.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

actors.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
actors.biography: Leonardo DiCaprio is an American actor, film producer, and environmentalist. He has been nominated for numerous awards, including seven Academy Awards, and has won several, including an Oscar for Best Actor for his role in 'The Revenant'.

actors.name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt
actors.biography: Joseph Gordon-Levitt is an American actor, filmmaker, singer, and entrepreneur. He rose to prominence for his role in the television series '3rd Rock from the Sun' and has since starred in films such as '(500) Days of Summer' and 'Inception'.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

photo.altText: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring poster

actors.name: Elijah Wood
actors.biography: Elijah Wood is an American actor and producer. He is best known for his role as Frodo Baggins in 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy.

actors.name: Viggo Mortensen
actors.biography: Viggo Mortensen is a Danish-American actor, author, musician, photographer, poet, and painter. He is best known for his role as Aragorn in 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

actors.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
actors.biography: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor, producer, and environmentalist. He has often played unconventional roles, particularly in biopics and period films. DiCaprio has been nominated for numerous awards, winning his first Oscar for his role in The Revenant.

actors.name: Kate Winslet
actors.biography: Kate Elizabeth Winslet is an English actress known for her work in independent films, particularly period dramas and tragedies. She is the recipient of numerous accolades, including an Academy Award, three British Academy Film Awards, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, four Golden Globe Awards, and a Grammy Award.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

actors.name: Brad Pitt
actors.biography: William Bradley Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He has received multiple awards and nominations including an Academy Award as producer under his own company, Plan B Entertainment.

actors.name: Christoph Waltz
actors.biography: Christoph Waltz is an Austrian-German actor and director. He is widely known for his collaborations with Quentin Tarantino, appearing in Inglourious Basterds and Django Unchained, for which he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

actors.name: Matthew McConaughey
actors.biography: Matthew McConaughey is an American actor and producer. He first gained notice for his supporting performance in the coming-of-age comedy Dazed and Confused, considered by many to be his breakout role.

actors.name: Anne Hathaway
actors.biography: Anne Jacqueline Hathaway is an American actress. She is the recipient of various accolades, including an Academy Award, a Primetime Emmy Award, and a Golden Globe Award. Hathaway has also won a British Academy Film Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

photo.altText: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone poster

actors.name: Daniel Radcliffe
actors.biography: Daniel Radcliffe is an English actor and producer. He is best known for playing Harry Potter in the film series of the same name, based on the novels by J. K. Rowling.

actors.name: Emma Watson
actors.biography: Emma Charlotte Duerre Watson is an English actress, model, and activist. She is known for her roles in both blockbusters and independent films, as well as for her activism in promoting education for girls around the world.

actors.name: Rupert Grint
actors.biography: Rupert Alexander Lloyd Grint is an English actor. He rose to prominence for his portrayal of Ron Weasley, one of the three main characters in the Harry Potter film series, based on J. K. Rowling's best-selling novels.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

photo.altText: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets poster

actors.name: Daniel Radcliffe
actors.biography: Daniel Radcliffe is an English actor and producer. He is best known for playing Harry Potter in the film series of the same name, based on the novels by J. K. Rowling.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
description: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: A young wizard finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as 'the property of the Half-Blood Prince' and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

description: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.
